name: International Conference on Ubiquitous Communication (Ucom 2023)
content: This conference will result in high-quality academic papers to jointly promote the development of ubiquitous communication systems. The technical scope of the conference includes, but is not limited to, communication theory and techniques, signal processing and image processing, networking, optical communication, machine learning and optimization for wireless systems, and emerging technologies, standards and applications in the field of ubiquitous communications. Excellent papers will have the opportunity to be recommended to journals such as Journal of Information and Intellegence (continuously updated) for review. Track 1\. Communication Theory and Techniques Track 2\. Signal Processing & Image Processing Track 3\. Networking Track 4\. Optical Communication Track 5\. Machine Learning & Optimization for Wireless Systems Track 6\. Emerging Technologies, Standards, and Applications
